title: Nassau, Bahamas
summary: Nassau (/ˈnæsɔː/ NASS-aw) is the capital and largest city of The Bahamas. With a population of 274,400 as of 2016, or just over 70% of the entire population of The Bahamas (≈391,000), Nassau is commonly defined as a primate city, dwarfing all other towns in the country.[3] It is the centre of commerce, education, law, administration, and media of the country.
